channel.title: TJ is rambling ++
channel.description: Recent content on TJ is rambling ++

item.title: How This Blog Come Into Place
item.description: I need a blog my choice is HUGO brew install hugo or else smoke test hugo version init blog hugo new site ${your_blog_name} cd to your blog’s directory git init let Git be in charge of current folder’s history add the theme you like, I like archie theme git submodule add https://github.com/athul/archie.git themes/archie config via hugo.toml add the above you just install echo "theme = 'archie'" >> hugo.toml light & dark mode subtitle for your blog up & run hugo server all blogs go in content/posts directory, see hugo new content posts/${name-for-your-post}.
